meanings.definition: To offer or present for acceptance
meanings.sent1: She tendered her resignation to the company.
meanings.sent2: He tendered his apologies for the mistake.
meanings.sent3: The cat tendered a toy mouse as a gift to its owner.
meanings.sent4: The student tendered a unique solution to the problem.
meanings.sent5: The chef tendered a delicious dish for the food critics to taste.

meanings.sent1: The tendered hug from the child warmed her heart.
meanings.sent2: His tendered words brought comfort to the grieving family.
meanings.sent3: The tendered puppy licked her face with joy.
meanings.sent4: The tendered smile on her face brightened the room.
meanings.sent5: The tendered gesture of holding hands showed their love.

meanings.sent1: The tendered steak melted in his mouth.
meanings.sent2: The ripe fruit was so tendered that it was effortless to eat.
meanings.sent3: The tendered bread was perfect for making sandwiches.
meanings.sent4: The tendered vegetables were ideal for the soup.
meanings.sent5: The tendered chicken was juicy and flavorful.
